comment: Reads through slides and doesn't teach the material at all. Can't make a test to save her life... they come out confusing and nothing like the textbook. Any other professor would be better than her. I'm an ACCT major, and she's making me fall out of love with it
I didn't know what to do with my self. Until I took this class. This class made me want to become an accounting major. It just all makes sense.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: I was so nervous about taking this class. Ms smith makes accounting seem easy. She is a great professor.
Wow!  SO impressed with this professor.  She went over and beyond the norm to help me when I was struggling.  I wish I had professors like her ever semester.
I was really nervous taking an online class but Ms. Smith made it seem easy. She gave us her cell number and we could call anytime. I'm thinking of changing my major to accounting.

Took ACCT 1 and 2 and easily one of my favorite professors, she really goes the extra mile to try to make sure everyone gets an A while not handing them out. She grades attendance (8.6%) and homework (26%) but the rest of the grade is on 3 tests. She does the lecture one class and goes over the problems the next so all info is really hammered home.
Best teacher I've had!  She's always willing to help more than any professor I have ever had!
Best professor I've ever had.  Goes beyond what is expected and you can tell she cares about her students.

Very simple course, though she spent so much time telling us how difficult it was. You have to pay for the online book to do homework so a physical copy is pretty unnecessary. She grades attendance and homework.

Useless is all I can say. Be prepared to teach yourself. She doesn't answer calls or emails and then acts like it is your fault. She is unimaginative & only posts pages from the book rather than subject help. Too busy to do her job and does not care about students. I asked for help since February and never got a response from her.

horrible teacher. i'm a commuter student and it's hard to get a hold with her. went to her office hours and she wasn't there (3x) so i gave up. i spent my semester watching youtube accounting videos and taught myself accounting. wish they would have hired someone else instead of her.

I think the whole class will agree with me that she's a great motivational speaker, however, her teaching skills need to be better (horrible at it). She's trying to do too many things (multiple jobs) at once which hurts her students' ability to learn the subject. I would rather see her be a guest speaker at the school than take her as a professor.
The class is somewhat fast paced but she will make time for anyone who needs help and wants everyone to do well. Not an easy class but the homework is helpful.
